In euca3 you can modify the CSS of the admin portal

In case custom Look & Feel is needed to Admin Portal there is couple of files that needs to be edited on Front-end server.

Browse the webapp folder

    cd /var/run/eucalyptus/webapp/themes/active

This folder as style file global.css where you can edit the background colors or wallpaper.

Also the logo.png can be be replaced with the your Cloud logo picture.
